  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - ,resourceBundle used to initialize populateTimes, populateCustomers(), populateContact(), populateUsers() methods. Runs setUpAction() function which populates many appointment fields from the resultset.

    • setUpAction

      public void setUpAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - setUpAction function that retrieves appointment data, saves it into a ResultSet and populates the fields with it. Also populates Date and Time ComboBoxes

    • directToDashboard

      actionEvent - directToDashboard function used to redirect user to Dashboard page.

    • saveApptChanges

      public void saveApptChanges(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - saveApptChanges function saves updated appointment data while continuing to check for conflict.
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

      public void resetAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
